did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Letter Book of William J. Ross, 1872-1875
did.abstract: William J. Ross was a U.S. Army officer of the 21st Infantry and a Quartermaster stationed at the Headquarters, Dept. of Arizona, Prescott, Arizona Territory during the period of the letters. Holograph carbons of letters written Sept. 4, 1872 to Jan. 15, 1875 concerning accounting for supplies, clothing, equipment, and payrolls for the posts.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Letter Book of William J. Ross (AZ 145). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: U.S. Army officer; 21st Infantry, Quartermaster stationed at the Headquarters, Dept. of Arizona, Prescott, Arizona Territory during the period of the letters.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph carbons of letters written Sept. 4, 1872 to Jan. 15, 1875 concerning accounting for supplies, clothing, equipment, and payrolls for the posts. Most are transmittal letters for reports which are not included. Includes a name index.

item.corpname: United States. Army. Department of Arizona.
